amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part D of House Report 115-766 to expand treatment coverage to individuals suffering from cocaine use disorder (which includes crack cocaine).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rush amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Rush.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rush amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
